infos.value: I wish it weren't. They've already drawn near.
It would appear we cannot afford to rest here. We must leave this place at once.
Our hands are bound. Let us keep moving.
Lord Mont... Why didn't you tell your father that the soldiers knew about the cave?
You find her suspicious as well, Lord Mont?
He said that they had crossed paths once before.
It's natural for people to cross paths during their travels though, isn't it?
I still can't shake this feeling in my gut...
I understand. I'll keep an eye on her.
